message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its potential, I'm initially offering it for $11,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I'm holding out for something closer to $10,500.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment at that price.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10,250. I think that's a fair compromise.
